scripts.build:tgenerate: find content/blog -maxdepth 1 -type d ! -path content/blog -exec sh -c 'tcardgen -f tcardgen/kintosans -t tcardgen/mb_template.png content/blog/"$(basename "{}")"/index.md -o content/blog/"$(basename "{}")"/twitter_feature.png'  \;
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:genwebp && npm run build:generate && npm run build:tgenerate
scripts.deploy:gi: cd public && git init && git add .
scripts.deploy:gra: cd public && git remote add origin git@github.com:barklund/mortenbarklund.github.io.git
scripts.deploy:ggp: cd public && git push --force origin main
